GSD.product_version: versions from v5.16 to before v5.16.19
GSD.description:
gfs2: Fix gfs2_file_buffered_write endless loop workaround

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.19 by commit 6a5e6d01a6e9e2c9ce86ce540ee5ea22fa5c8304, it was introduced in version v5.16 by commit 554c577cee95bdc1d03d9f457e57dc96eb791845. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: gfs2: Fix gfs2_file_buffered_write endless loop workaround
